settings.leftsubheading: By Warren Norman - March 10th, 2023 - 11:28 AM PDT
settings.imagesubheading: Did you know that over 35 million people regularly suffer from sleep-breathing disorder – or share a bed with someone who does?
settings.text:
Have you been struggling to enjoy a peaceful night's sleep without breathing difficulties interrupting your rest?


Are you haunted by snoring that sabotages your sleep quality, leaving you drained even after a full night's rest?


Chances are, you've been unknowingly relying on mouth-breathing to get by…


Well, let me tell you, I'm in the same boat! You see, for as long as I can remember, mouth-breathing has been my go-to mode.


I only recently discovered that our bodies were designed to breathe through the nose (NOT the mouth!), but I think my body never got that memo…


And the experts agree: mouth-breathing comes with a host of unwelcome side effects, like poor sleep, a parched and dry mouth, irregular breathing patterns, and, of course, that thunderous snoring.


Feeling perpetually tired? It's likely because your body works double or even tenfold to draw in a deep breath and secure enough oxygen. (This is especially true when you're asleep.)


The less oxygen your body can harness, the more exhausted and lifeless you may feel…


Sounds familiar?


Fear not, you're in ‘good’ company! Approximately 50% of men are grappling with mouth-breathing.


And that doesn't even take into account those wrestling with nasal obstructions like a deviated septum, sinusitis, or allergies…

It feels like you're trying to inhale through a crumpled straw…


Better nose breathing can improve your life in more ways than you think. It can help you stop snoring, improve sleep quality and athletic performance, and even enhance your mood.

settings.leftheading: According to my doctor, this whole fiasco boils down to excess mucus production in my nose
settings.text:
That pesky stuff accumulates in the nasal passages over time, obstructing the nasal airways like an impenetrable fortress, and forcing the body to breathe through the mouth.


And oh, the countless meds and sprays she prescribed in an attempt to free up those blocked passages!


But my body, ever the quick learner, adapted in no time, rendering them ineffective after just a few rounds.


Besides, I've never been one to rely on pills – they just don't sit well with me, literally and figuratively…


I was devastated and afraid, convinced that this was a battle I'd be waging for the rest of my days…


And truth be told, I might have actually thrown in the towel if it hadn't been for that eye-opening conversation with my wife one fateful evening…


"There has to be something out there that can help you. Let's not give up just yet."


With renewed vigor, we started on a quest to find an alternative solution. 


We scoured articles, consulted experts, and left no stone unturned.


And just when we were about to lose hope, a chance encounter with my doctor led to an unexpected revelation…

settings.leftheading: “Before Considering Any Extreme Measures, You Might Want To Try This…”
settings.text:
"You know," Dr.Emily said, a knowing smile playing on her lips, "there's one thing we haven't tried yet, and it has worked wonders for many of my patients."


My curiosity ignited, and I leaned in closer, eager to hear more about this elusive remedy that could potentially transform my life…

"Think of it, Warren: how do you take care of your teeth daily?" she asked. "You brush them twice a day, right?"


Absolutely. And I floss them regularly. Well, I try my best…


"Exactly! That's the same approach you should adopt for your nose if you want to keep it free from mucus buildup and irritants that block your airways, hinder your breathing, and force you to breathe through your mouth!"


Especially for folks like me, dealing with excess mucus production and grappling with breathing disorders!


"So, you're saying I need a toothbrush for my nose!?" I asked Dr. Emily, baffled.


She chuckled. "Haha, not quite. But it does work like a super-charged brush for your nose!"


And that's when she unveiled the ingenious device she developed in partnership with one US-based startup called Cleanux.

​​Cleanux is a cutting-edge nasal decongestion and sinus cleansing device that rejuvenates your nasal passages and transcends your breathing experience.


It immediately boosts airflow, washes away stubborn mucus buildup, and frees you from the clutches of nasal discomfort.


Cleanux uses a powerful yet controlled and gentle stream of water to naturally dislodge stubborn mucus buildup in your nose, and wash away all pesky irritants and culprits of nasal discomfort.


You can truly sense your nasal pathways opening up, allowing for better airflow and rejuvenated breathing!


The best part?


Cleanux is entirely drug-free, with no prescriptions needed, and safe for all to enjoy with no concerns about undesired side effects or potential problems from long-term medication use.


In fact, Cleanux employs a technique that has been around for years... 


Alas, past solutions were flawed by user-unfriendly designs, eliciting pain, and displeasure, turning the experience into a dreaded hassle!


But now, thanks to a team of medical experts, Cleanux is here: different pressure options make the water stream controlled and gentle but also more powerful, making the process feels like a breeze!

settings.leftheading: After a Weeklong Trial: Here is the verdict
settings.text:
After trying it for a whole week, I'm thrilled to report that it's nothing short of a life-changer.


The impact was immediate—right from the very first use, I experienced the incredible relief of taking deep, easy breaths through both my nostrils!


I won't go into the nitty-gritty of what cleared out of my nose, but let me tell you, witnessing all that gunk flowing away into the sink was a spectacle to behold!


Now, I use it every night before bed, and it's made a world of difference. I sleep soundly all night long without waking up feeling out of breath.


And get this—my wife is overjoyed that my snoring, which used to sound like a roaring bulldozer, has quieted down!


Mornings have taken on a new glow too. I no longer wake up with that bothersome dry throat, and I find myself feeling refreshed and bursting with energy all day long—all thanks to a restful night's sleep!


I honestly couldn’t recall when was the last time I could breathe like this and sleep through the whole night without breathing troubles…


I can tell you that if it weren't for this, I would still be struggling with restless nights.


It’s like the gift of breathing.

Harnessing the power of Cleanux is easy — It's like an electric toothbrush, but meticulously engineered for your nasal passages:


  • Begin by filling the Cleanux reservoir with water, followed by the addition of a tbsp of sea salt.


This harmonious blend generates a gentle, yet effective, saline stream that thoroughly flushes your nasal cavities, masterfully flushing down mucus and irritants culprits behind that pesky congestion, and making the process weirdly pleasant!


  • Choose your ideal pressure mode from three tailored options: Normal, Soft, and Pulse.


Each is calibrated to deliver a customized experience, catering to your comfort and preference.


  • Revel in the instant liberation as mucus effortlessly rinses away, immediately granting you the unparalleled gift of unobstructed breathing!


The Cleanux experience is flexible — repeat as often as desired to achieve and maintain pristine nasal passages, free from irritants and congestion.


Whether you're seeking relief from breathing troubles or simply striving for optimal nasal hygiene, Cleanux is your trusted companion!

Undeniably, Cleanux is swiftly capturing the hearts of those grappling with mouth breathing and sleep disturbance — but that's not all!


Cleanux is also incredibly effective in clearing your nasal passages when facing temporary ailments like colds, flu, or hay fever. Why? Because it swiftly lifts that 'burden of congestion' brought on by mucus accumulation.


Picture it: Transforming your mucus-blocked nasal airways into pristine, open passages where air can flow freely and effortlessly: Naturally, Safely, and Drug-Free.


Here’s who will benefit most from the clear breathing that Cleanux provides:


  • Lifelong “mouth breathers”: if you’ve always breathed through your mouth, you’ll be blown away by how amazing it feels to finally take full breaths!


  • Thunderous snorers: if you or your partner is constantly snoring, Cleanux can help. Breathing through an unobstructed nasal cavity lowers your risk of snoring and sleep apnea.


  • Dream Chasers: Sleep enthusiasts seeking optimal rest and enhanced breathing during slumber


  • Sensitivity Savvy: Individuals attuned to pollen, dust, dander, dust mites, and more…


  • Sinus Sentinels: People with Sinusitis, Deviated Septum, Nasal Polyps, or Snoring Issues


  • People who struggle with nasal eczema: breathing through your nose helps humidify inhaled air. Therefore, if your nasal cavity is chronically dry and causing routine blockages, Cleanux could help.


  • Nocturnal Navigators: Night owls and shift workers struggling with disrupted sleep patterns.


  • Those who want to get back in shape: breathing through your nose helps your diaphragm work properly. If you’re just getting back into shape and cardio days are a true struggle, Cleanux could help (plus, it helps improve your lung volume!).


Ever since I started using Cleanux on a regular basis, I’ve had more energy, I sleep better, and I’ve actually started to enjoy exercising.


I’ve told all my friends about it, and it’s done the same exact thing for them — they’re sleeping soundly, and, like me, are now breathing effortlessly around the clock!
